title: Sexual Abuse in Christian Homes and Churches - Collection 11
description:
Sexual Abuse in Christian Homes and Churches - Collection 11:

We have 33 titles in this upload. It included the book: "My Story" written by Elizabeth Smart, the young woman who were abducted at the age of 14 by a delusional Mormon ex-preacher, and used as his second wife for 9 months.

-  Beech et al (Eds.) - Assessment and Treatment of Sex Offenders; a Handbook (2009)

-  Brown & Walklate (Eds.) - Handbook on Sexual Violence (2012)

-  Cook & Hodo - When Women Sexually Abuse Men; the Hidden Side of Rape, Stalking, Harassment, and Sexual Assault (2013)

-  Coppin - Healing from Rape Trauma (2000)

-  Corrigan - Up Against a Wall; Rape Reform and the Failure of Success (2003)

-  Cotterill (Ed.) - The Language of Sexual Crime (2007)

-  D'Antonio - Mortal Sins; Sex, Crime, and the Era of Catholic Scandal (2013)

-  Dicataldo - The Perversion of Youth; Controversies in the Assessment and Treatment of Juvenile Sex Offenders (2009)

-  Ellsworth - Choosing to Heal; Using Reality Therapy in the Treatment of Sexually Abused Children (2007)

-  Fagan - Sexual Disorders; Perspectives on Diagnosis and Treatment (2004)

-  Fitzwater - The Manager's Pocket Guide to Preventing Sexual Harassment (1998)

-  Glass - Mummy Told Me Not to Tell; the True Story of a Troubled Boy with a Dark Secret (2010)

-  Goodwin - Heal the Abuse; Recover Your Life (2010)

-  Michaud & Hazelwood - The Evil That Men Do; FBI Profiler Roy Hazelwood's Journey into the Minds of Sexual Predators (1998)

-  Miletic - Abuse of Power; the Impact of the Media, the Public & the Massachusetts Attorney General .. (2005)

-  Ruggiero - The Boundaries of Eros; Sex Crime and Sexuality in Renaissance Venice (1985)
